description.title: About
description.content: The WorkPlusFE DevTools is to improve the efficiency of development and joint debugging based on the WorkPlus mobile platform. The tool focuses on the simulation of real environment data and interfaces during the development process. By creating roles and application portals, you can quickly switch environments and greatly improve development efficiency.

tips.title: Current application startup parameters:
tips.message: The above parameters are only applicable to the PC client to start the application. If you want to use it on the mobile H5, you need to bring the specified placeholder on the link. To learn more, please check
